coded_answer.p: Thank you very much for your letter of 1/6/00. I was really amazed withby the newnews that I'd won two weeks at Camp California in the USA.

RespectWith regard to the date that I would like to travel it must be only on July 15th because my classes will finish at the end of June and I'm going to behave withsome free time to do so sincefrom this date until early August thatwhen I will start to work.

I would like to spend my time at your Camp site in a log cabinslog cabin. I think that is going to be more confortablecomfortable for me due to the fact that I'amI am very sensitive to changes of temperature and I can't take the risk of to catchcatching a cold because ,as you know, I'm going to start to work.

The activities that I would like to do there are the followingsfollowing:- Singing (I'm a very good singer); swimming (I'm not good at all at this one), I'm not good at all at this one, but I enjoy to spendspending time in the water, I really do.

Would you be so kind as to let me know what kind of weather do you have onin July in order that I can to choosechoose the right clothclothing to bring and. And also I would like to know approximately the amount of money that I should bring for the items that are not coverincluded.
Looking forward to hearing from you.

How are you? I'm fine and I am writtingwriting to you because I know that you want to know about my experience at a pop concert; I have to tell you that I did to helphelp there and it was a very hard work you. You can't imaginimagine all the work that meanmeansgoes into to preparepreparing a concert. I really enjoyed the opportunity to talk with well knownwell-known startsstars and to learn how to set up everything for a concert. If you have the opportunity to do this don't missedmiss out. I hope to see you soon to tellgive you more details. Bye.
